<h3 id="X31434">X(31434) = CENTROID OF CURVATURES OF THESE CIRCLES: {BEVAN, INCIRCLE, NINE-POINTS}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a^4+(b+c)*a^3-3*(b+c)^2*a^2-(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)*a+2*(b^2-c^2)^2  :  :

<p>
X(31434) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (5219, 31479), (30282, 5218)<br>
X(31434) = X(5231)-of-inner-Yff triangle<br>
X(31434) = {X(i), X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (1737, 10056, 1), (6734, 10528, 6765), (10915, 26363, 4853)<br>
